resources.string: Access Key No Longer Usable in Flipcash
Your Access Key has initiated an unlock. As a result, you will no longer be able to use this Access Key in Flipcash
Only accounts created through Flipcash are currently supported
To learn how to get more funds go to the FAQ in Settings
Flipcash is designed for small, every day transactions. Your daily give limit will increase tomorrow
You can only give up to %1$s
Flipcash is designed for small, every day transactions. Your daily send limit will increase tomorrow
Failed to create a cashlink. Please try again
Failed to restore selected account. Please try again
Your camera is used to grab Digital Cash. Please allow access to the camera to proceed
Please allow Push Notifications to get notified when you receive cash
Code enables you to grab Digital Cash by pointing your camera at the digital bill on another user\'s phone
You need to allow camera access to be able to grab Digital Cash
We were unable to cancel your transfer. Please try again
The money will be returned to your wallet
